Unified Process in ℰ-QFT

By jonsvein Heinesen

Unified Process in ℰ-QFT

1 · Fundamental Discrete Scales

  • Tick time T0 = ps
  • Base frequency f0 = 1∕T0 = THz
  • Length per tick L0 = c T0 = mm

2 · Discrete-Step Evolution Rule

\[ \psi*{\,n+1}(x)=\mathcal{E}\, e^{-\,iH\,T*{0}/\hbar}\, \psi*{\,n}(x), \qquad t=nT*{0}. \]

3 · Phase-Lock Constraint

\[ N\,\frac{H\,T\_{0}}{\hbar}=2\pi m, \qquad m\in\mathbb{Z}\!. \]

For N=7 this gives H = 2πħ ⁄ (7 T0).

4 · Discrete Action

\[ S=\sum*{n=0}^{N-1} L\!\left( x*{n}, \frac{x*{n+1}-x*{n}}{T*{0}} \right) T*{0}, \qquad x*{n}=x(nT*{0}). \]

5 · Structure-Formation Examples

  1. Molecular bonds: δφ = 2πL⁄L0
  2. Double-slit fringes: Δx = k L0
  3. Cosmic nodes via periodic “snap-back.”

6 · Unification Statement

One tick, one frequency—no separate renormalisation scales.

7 · Benchmarks for Validation

  • Bond lengths & angles (molecular).
  • Fringe spacing (double-slit).
  • Large-scale structure statistics.

Master Constant Sheet (for reference only)

T0 =  ps
f0 =  THz
L0 =  mm
ħ  =  eV·s
